title: 50 books cost Rs. 4000. if the price rises by 25%, how much will 36 books cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cost of one book = 4000/50 = 80 If price increases by 25% New cost of one book = 80 * (125/100) = 100 Cost price of 36 books = 36 * 100 = 3600
One book cost =₹4000/50=₹80 25%rise price than=80*125/100=₹100 36books cost price =36*100=₹3600
Cost of 50 books:— Re 4000 Cost of a book :— 80 If price rises by 25% Cost of 1 book :— 80 X 1.25 = Rs 100 Cost of 36 books :— Rs 3600
